title: 6.3 Master Challenge 3
question: Write a program to create a pivot table for data on car sales. The pivot table is to summarize the data with the Year as the index and mean values of the sales in both ABC showroom and XYZ showroom, each year.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java
